info.name: FCChh_ECalBarrel_Mockup_NoCryostat
info.title: Simple ECal Barrel Calorimeter without cryostat
info.author: A.Dell'Acqua, J.Faltova
info.comment: Most simple liquid argon - lead Ecal design. It consists of cylindrical layers of lead and liquid argon. It does not include cryostat. Active volume is the same as in the case with cryostat in front.
